original: intros r Hrat Hge0 Hle1. destruct Hrat as [pq Hpq]. destruct pq as [p q]. exists (p, q). destruct Hpq as [Hn0 Heqr]. destruct (frac_rat p q) as [[Hp0 [Hqpos Hpq]] | [Hpneg [Hqneg Hqp]]]; try tauto. split; [assumption | split; [assumption | split; [assumption | split; [apply Hpq | rewrite Heqr; reflexivity]]]].
